creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: gray glazed stoneware dome split into two halves; side (a) has slightly more pink glaze and has writing on the base; side (b) has more white glaze; thin, irregularly shaped bisque porcelain or blade (c) sheet sits vertically between the two halves of the dome
markings: base of one dome half (a), green pigment: 631399
signed: base of one dome half (a), green pigment: R
title: Split dome and blade
